channel.title: Software on Synthetic Yeast: Sc2.0

item.title: BioStudio
item.description: Update for 2023 We recommend installing as an AWS EC2 instance using our AMI ami-dcb8f4b6 as described in our supplement from Richardson et al 2017 Science. Most of the notes below are standard procedures for launching an AWS EMI. The BioStudio-specific notes are highlighted as BioStudio-specific. Amazon provides a guide to launching an EC2 instance. We recommend an instance with resources equivalent to m5.xlarge or larger and configuring to accept SSH, HTTPS, and HTTP.
